name: Biriyani
content: A delightfully delicious combo of all time loved country chicken biryani served along with raita.

name: Parotta
content: A delightfully scrumptious combo of egg kothu parotta plain non veg salan and raita.

name: Shawarma
content: Grilled strips of marinated chicken wrapped in a soft kuboos with select veggies and mayonnaise.
